ISSUE.TITLE: Google analytics plugin description is misleading
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Steps to reproduce the problem: Nop.Plugin.Widgets.GoogleAnalytics instruction still says `"If you would like to switch between Google Analytics (used by default) and Universal Analytics, then please use the buttons below:"`. Made me question my eyes for a bit. Apparently, buttons were removed while implementing #2963, yet instruction lives till today. So, let's check and update the locales in this plugin.
